Package org.NewTicTacToe

Class StateManager

java.lang.Object
org.NewTicTacToe.StateManager
public class StateManager extends Object
The StateManager class is responsible for saving and loading the game state to and from a file. The state of the game is stored in a file named game_state.json under a directory named data. The class uses the GSON library to serialize and deserialize objects to and from JSON format.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StateManager()
    The constructor creates an instance of the GSON library and makes sure the data directory exists.

  • Constructor Details

    • StateManager

      public StateManager()
      The constructor creates an instance of the GSON library and makes sure the data directory exists. If the directory does not exist, it will be created.

  • Method Details

    • saveGameState

      public void saveGameState(Board board, String player1Name, String player2Name)
      Saves the current state of the game to a file.
      Parameters:
      board - The current state of the board.
      player1Name - The name of the first player.
      player2Name - The name of the second player.

    • loadGameState

      public Board loadGameState()
      Loads the game state from the file.
      Returns:
      The current state of the board if the file exists, otherwise returns null.

    • deleteGameState

      public void deleteGameState(Board board)
      Deletes the game state file.
      Parameters:
      board - The current state of the board.
